text.section: The provisions of this subtitle are in addition to and not in substitution for the provisions of Title 3, Subtitle 8 of the Courts and Judicial Proceedings Article.

Except as otherwise provided in § 5-705.1 of this subtitle, the provisions of this subtitle apply only to:
suspected abuse or neglect that is alleged to have occurred in this State; and
suspected abuse or neglect of a child who lives in this State, regardless of where the suspected abuse or neglect is alleged to have occurred.
